it
Class LineGraph

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--it.Graphable
        |
        +--it.LineGraph
public class LineGraph
extends Graphable

This class allows a simple line function to be graphed. The function is based on a gradient and an intercept.

Field Summary
protected  double gradient
          value for m in f(x) = mx + c
protected  double intercept
          value for c in f(x) = mx + c

evaluateXY

protected final void evaluateXY(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double p)
Evaluate f(x) = mx + c. A valid x value is in the point p and a corresponding graph-space y value is calculated.
Parameters:
p - a double precision 2D point. On entry into this method p.x is valid and on exit p.y = f(x).
